text: @Scavino45 @POTUS @realDonaldTrump Stop having your little pity parties during the covid-19 briefings. You didn't take it seriously in Dec and Jan and now the rest of us are paying the price. Nothing you say is true and no one with a brain even believes you! And stop bragging, we don't believe that either.
